The SG550-1 is a marksman variant of the popular Swiss-made SG550. It constitutes a perfect middle ground between a sniper and an assault rifle, retaining the strong points of both types of weaponry. On the other hand, it suffers from certain drawbacks such as somewhat lacking in stopping power and accuracy for a sniper rifle and a lack of automatic fire. Still, it remains one of the best top-tier weapon systems available within the Exclusion Zone.

The SG 552 Commando is designed for urban combat, making it the most compact member of SIG's renowned SG 550 family, which enhances its CQC capabilities. It has a shorter 226mm barrel and gas tube, ventilated handguards and a redesigned bolt carrier group that was integrated with a piston rod to form a single moving assembly.
